item.description:
Let's continue this standing meetup while Rebekah is away.
You're welcome to join us for a fun easy going get together.
No pressure to speak completely in Portuguese.
You can get comfortable by just listening then jump in the conversation when you're ready.

You're welcome to eat while we chat. Here are the menus for food and beer.


There will NOT be a group bill. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go since people will be arriving and leaving at various times.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be downstairs at the high tables in the bar area. We'll be under the faux stained glass windows. Picture of seating area is in photo section. Look for the Portuguese sign on the wall or ask the host.
item.why: This is an informal, fun, and low key way to practice speaking Portuguese, so that when you finally make it back to Ipanema you can wow the natives with your accent, as well as your tan.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Table
